title: Hello World
Input Test
code:
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
	fmt.Println("hello world")
	var name string
	fmt.Scanln(&name)
	fmt.Println(name)
}

title: For Loop
For Loop
Sleep
code:
package main
import (
	"fmt"
	"time"
)
func main() {
	fmt.Printf("Start Unix Time: %v\n", time.Now().Unix())
	time.Sleep(2 * time.Second)
	fmt.Printf("Current Unix Time: %v\n", time.Now().Unix())
	time.Sleep(2 * time.Second)
	fmt.Printf("Current Unix Time: %v\n", time.Now().Unix())
	time.Sleep(2 * time.Second)
	fmt.Printf("Current Unix Time: %v\n", time.Now().Unix())
	time.Sleep(2 * time.Second)
	fmt.Printf("Current Unix Time: %v\n", time.Now().Unix())
	time.Sleep(2 * time.Second)
	fmt.Printf("End Unix Time: %v\n", time.Now().Unix())
}

title: Name input
code:
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
	fmt.Print("Name : ")
	var name string
	fmt.Scanln(&name)
	fmt.Printf("Your name %s", name)
}
